tool.name: get_gene_categories
tool.description: retrieve gene categories for model organisms

param.help: These are bioconductor genome annotation packages.
param.label: Select the genome package
param.name: package

param.help: This option determines which gene identifier format is used for mapping genes to categories in the output file. If you have a list of differentially expressed genes, choose the same format.
param.label: Select gene identifier format
param.name: gene_id
cats
param.label: Select categories
param.help: Select a category will return the category and a list of all genes in that category

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool uses bioconductor species annotation packages [org.Xx.xx.db] to extract gene category information. To do gene {category/set} enrichment analysis, use the output of this tool with the goseq tool.
